questions.question: Identify the sentence where the adverb modifies an adjective, not a verb.
Choose the grammatically correct sentence where an adverb of frequency is used appropriately.
options: She always is arriving late to meetings.
They go sometimes to the countryside.

questions.question: Which of the following sentences misuses the adverb of manner?
options: She spoke kindly to the children.
He drove carefully on the icy road.
They laughed happily during the horror movie.
The teacher explained the topic clearly.
questions.answer: They laughed happily during the horror movie.
